channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: America’s Biggest Bitcoin Miners Are Pivoting to AI
item.description: In the face of a profitability crisis, industrial-scale bitcoin miners are transforming their data centers into AI factories.

item.title: Dell Coupon Codes: 10% Off | December 2025
item.description: Get 10% off with verified Dell promo code, plus today’s coupons for up to $600 off laptops, Alienware monitors, and all things tech.

item.title: San Francisco Mayor Daniel Lurie: ‘We Are a City on the Rise’
item.description: Since taking office, San Francisco’s mayor has been on a quest to revitalize the city and increase public safety. He’s also kept the National Guard ou...

item.title: Can Bike Riders and Self-Driving Cars Be Friends?
item.description: Some cycling advocates are on board with robotaxis. Others see the self-driving car boom as perpetuating auto dependency.

item.title: 50% Off Chewy Promo Code | December 2025
item.description: Explore Chewy coupon codes for 20% off pet food with holiday deals, a free $30 gift card, buy 2 get 1 free offers and more.

item.title: FTC upholds ban on stalkerware founder Scott Zuckerman
item.description: Zuckerman, who used to run the stalkerware apps SpyFone and SpyTrac, claimed the ban is hurting his unrelated business.

item.title: Google’s AI try-on app Doppl adds a shoppable discovery feed
item.description: The tech giant says the idea behind the new feed is to display recommendations so users can discover and virtually try on items. Nearly everything in ...

item.title: Department of Commerce approves Nvidia H200 chip exports to China
item.description: This news comes as a bill was introduced in Congress last week to prevent these exact kinds of chip exports.

item.title: Investor letter reveals skyrocketing growth of Waymo’s robotaxi rides
item.description: Six months ago, Waymo disclosed it was providing 250,000 robotaxi rides. But it's grown significantly since, a leaked letter says.

item.title: SoftBank and Nvidia reportedly in talks to fund Skild AI at $14B, nearly tripling its value
item.description: Skild AI is developing a hardware-agnostic foundation model for robots that can be customized for various uses.
